headline: Origin℠ AI and NXP Team Up to Accelerate Embedded WiFi Sensing for the Smart Home
summary: Origin℠ AI, the inventors of AI Sensing℠, today announced a strategic collaboration with NXP® Semiconductors, the trusted supplier for innovative solutions in industrial and IoT markets, to embed Origin's award-winning WiFi Sensing software directly into NXP's i.MX 9 applications processors and wireless tri-radio chipsets. This endeavor fast-tracks the deployment of intelligent motion sensing into smart home devices, opening the door for powerful new services across home automation, security and
